name: Professional inter-university Management for Educational Networking
goal: The purpose of the association is to develop and promote cross-cultural and interdisciplinary training, academic programmes and research in Belgium as well as abroad that add value to existing education, training and research. It facilitates cooperation between universities and enterprises and improve the exchange of information and know-how.
interests: Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs
euInitiatives:
The association follows EU directives on Higher education Modernization: COMMUNICATION FROM THE COMMISSION TO THE EUROPEAN
PARLIAMENT, THE COUNCIL, THE EUROPEAN ECONOMIC AND SOCIAL
COMMITTEE AND THE COMMITTEE OF THE REGIONS
on a renewed EU agenda for higher education, 2017
